search_results.title: Bio
search_results.snippet: Bridget Farr is an author, actor, and educator. Previously a middle school English teacher, she now serves as principal of a public Montessori school.

search_results.title: Bridget Cook-Burch “The Book Whisperer”

search_results.title: Bridget Brereton
search_results.snippet: Bridget Brereton (born 1946) is a Trinidad and Tobago-based historian, who is Emerita Professor of History at the University of the West Indies, St. Augustine.
